titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4060) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1999, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4060 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Points of order against provisions in the bill for failure to comply with clause 2, 5(b), or 6 of rule XXI are waived. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-586, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 212.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/18/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 4060 (energy and water development appropriations).
